00049 enum _plugin_mode{
00050         GFAL_PLUGIN_ALL=0,
00051         GFAL_PLUGIN_ACCESS,
00052         GFAL_PLUGIN_CHMOD,
00053         GFAL_PLUGIN_RENAME,
00054         GFAL_PLUGIN_SYMLINK,
00055         GFAL_PLUGIN_STAT,
00056         GFAL_PLUGIN_LSTAT,
00057         GFAL_PLUGIN_MKDIR,
00058         GFAL_PLUGIN_RMDIR,
00059         GFAL_PLUGIN_OPENDIR, // concat of opendir readdir, closedir
00060         GFAL_PLUGIN_OPEN, // concat of open read, close
00061         GFAL_PLUGIN_RESOLVE_GUID,

00064         GFAL_PLUGIN_LISTXATTR,

00077 struct _gfal_plugin_interface{
00078         // handle
00079         plugin_handle handle;
00080         // to have name/id of the plugin MUST be IMPLEMENTED
00081         const char* (*getName)();
00085         void (*plugin_delete)(plugin_handle); 
00091         gboolean (*check_plugin_url)(plugin_handle, const char* url,  plugin_mode mode, GError** err);
00095         int (*accessG)(plugin_handle, const char* path, int mode, GError** err);
00099         int     (*chmodG)(plugin_handle, const char *, mode_t, GError** err);
00100         int     (*renameG)(plugin_handle, const char *, const char *, GError** err);
00101         int (*symlinkG)(plugin_handle, const char*, const char*, GError** err);
00102         int (*statG)(plugin_handle, const char*, struct stat *buf, GError** err);
00103         int (*lstatG)(plugin_handle, const char*, struct stat *buf, GError** err);
00104         ssize_t (*readlinkG)(plugin_handle, const char*, char* buff, size_t buffsiz, GError** );
00105 
00106         // directory management
00107          gfal_file_handle (*opendirG)(plugin_handle, const char*, GError**); 
00108          int (*closedirG)(plugin_handle, gfal_file_handle, GError**);
00109          struct dirent* (*readdirG)(plugin_handle, gfal_file_handle, GError**);
00110         int (*mkdirpG)(plugin_handle, const char*, mode_t, gboolean pflag, GError**);  //function pointer for the mkdir call, if pflag is set, the call is considered like a recursive call for a full path creation
00111         int (*rmdirG )(plugin_handle, const char*, GError**);            
00112 
00113          // basic file operation, 
00114          gfal_file_handle (*openG)(plugin_handle, const char* path, int flag, mode_t mode, GError**);
00115          int (*readG)(plugin_handle, gfal_file_handle fd, void* buff, size_t count, GError**);
00116          int (*writeG)(plugin_handle, gfal_file_handle fd, void* buff, size_t count, GError**);
00117          int (*closeG)(plugin_handle, gfal_file_handle fd, GError **);
00118          int (*lseekG)(plugin_handle, gfal_file_handle fd, off_t offset, int whence, GError** err);
00119          
00120          // remove operations
00121          int (*unlinkG)(plugin_handle, const char* path, GError**);
00122          
00123          // advanced attributes management
00124          ssize_t (*getxattrG)(plugin_handle, const char*, const char*, void* buff, size_t s_buff, GError** err);
00125          ssize_t (*listxattrG)(plugin_handle, const char*, char* list, size_t s_list, GError** err);
00126          int (*setxattrG)(plugin_handle, const char*, const char*, const void*, size_t , int, GError** );
00127         
00128          int (*plugin_parameter)(plugin_handle handle, const char* name, char* value, size_t max_size, int flag_mode, GError** err);
00129         
00130 };

00135 struct _plugin_opts{
00136         gfal_plugin_interface plugin_list[MAX_PLUGIN_LIST];
00137         int plugin_number;
